definition[0]: to make something increase in value
example[0]: The oil shortage is bound to send prices up.
definition[1]: to make someone or something seem silly by copying them in a funny way
example[1]: The film hilariously sends up Hollywood disaster movies.
definition[2]: a film, article, show etc that copies someone or something in a way that makes them seem funny or silly
example[2]: a hilarious send-up of a Hollywood disaster movie
